summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StyleSphere fashion ecommerce store. All backend Flask API endpoints and frontend React components are working correctly. Authentication, product catalog, category filtering, search, and user profile management all functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Categories API endpoint with 4 categories (Men's Wear, Women's Wear, Children's Wear, Underwear)
Products API endpoint with 6 sample products
Homepage loading with hero section, categories, and featured products
Navigation between Home, Products, and Auth pages
Products page with grid and list view modes
Category filtering with URL parameter updates
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
